title: L'Oreal Paris Revitalift Deep Set Wrinkle Collagen Filler Lip, 0.2 Fluid Ounce
description: Step 1: Anti-feathering collagen biosphe resfills in vertical lines around the lips. Step 2: Plumping hyaluronic micro-spheres boosts natural hydration for a gentle lip plumping effect contouring action collagen and hydration are the key elements that keep lips looking young, smooth and defined. With time, collagen and moisture levels diminish, resulting in thinner lips and wrinkles around the mouth. Technological innovation: Inspired by dermatological lip plumping and contouring procedures, L'Oreal Paris has created collagen filler lip smoothes away lines around the lips with a daily boost of collagen and plumps the lips with hyaluronic micro-spheres. Actions Step 1: Around the lipsanti-feathering cream with collagen biospheres fills in vertical lines around the lips. Dramatically reduces lipstick feathering instantly redefines the lip-line. Step 2: On the lip slip plumping serum with hyaluronic micro-sphere's instantly boosts lips' natural hydration to smooth the surface and leave you lips looking fuller and smoother, perfected for lipstick application. Plumps lips instantly plumping effect appears to last for hours day after day, provides lips with plumping action does not change lipstick color lightweight, non-sticky, tasteless formula, quickly absorbsresultsinstantly get plumper, younger-looking lips with beautifully defined contours and zero feathering.

title: Rusk Speed Freak Professional Ceramic Tourmaline Hair Dryer, 2000 Watts
description: Rusk speed freak professional 2000 watt ceramic dryer is ideal for use on hair of any length, style, or texture. Especially effective on thick, coarse hair that is difficult to blow-dry.

title: REVLON Colorburst Lip Butter, Sugar Frosting, 0.09 Ounce
description: Color burst lip butter combines beautiful color with a buttery balm to give you baby soft, healthy glowing lips. It has a pampering gel formula which glides on lips buttery smooth and instantly hydrates lips.

title: Skinmedica Lytera Skin Brightening Complex, 2.0 Fluid Ounce
description: Clinically-tested advanced formula brightens dull skin and minimizes the appearance of skin discoloration and dark spots. Improvements seen as early as 4 weeks.
